body:
#Hi! I'm Jon, a Dev Sec Ops

Engineer graduated from Polytech Lyon, my skills area is development, computer security, system administration, network and design.

My values are Open Source and Edge Technology

Review my career in curriculum section and my works in projects section. Or contact me for a more formal version!

You can also view my GitHub resume!

Join me on codewars!
